General.Name: People.Cn Co Ltd
General.Description: People.cn CO., LTD operates as an information exchange platform in China and internationally. The company publishes news to Internet users covering politics, economy, society, and culture in the form of text, picture, animation, audio and video, BBS, blog, microblog, podcast, talk bar, mobile phone, RSS, and Webcast in multiple languages, including Chinese, Mongolian, Tibetan, Uygur, Kazakh, Korean, Yi, Zhuang, English, Japanese, French, Spanish, Russian, Arabic, and Korean. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: New Media Tower of People's Daily, Beijing, China, 100733
